branchCategory.name: 2/3 Port Valve, High Pressure
branchCategory.description: <p>The SGH 2 port high pressure coolant valve for coolant liquid (up to 3MPa/7MPa) is ideal for lubrication, dust blowing and cooling. It is available as solenoid and air operated the flow rate ranges from Cv of 1.8 to 6.5.</p>

branchItem.name: SGH, 2-Port Coolant Valve, External Pilot Solenoid
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Fluid temperature: -10 to 60 °C <LI>Pressure range: 0 to 7.0 MPa <LI>Port sizes: 3/8 to 1 inch <LI>Seals: NBR or FKM</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: SGHA, 2-Port Coolant Valve, Air Operated
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Fluid temperature: -10 to 60 °C <LI>Pressure range: 0 to 7.0 MPa <LI>Port sizes: 3/8 to 1 inch <LI>Seals: NBR or FKM</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: SGH, 3-Port Coolant Valve, External Pilot Solenoid
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Fluid temperature: -10 to 60 °C <LI>Pressure range: 0 to 7.0 MPa <LI>Port sizes: 3/8 to 1 inch <LI>Seals: NBR or FKM</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: SGHA, 3-Port Coolant Valve, Air Operated
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Fluid temperature: -10 to 60 °C <LI>Pressure range: 0 to 7.0 MPa <LI>Port sizes: 3/8 to 1 inch <LI>Seals: NBR or FKM</LI></UL>
